verbs.description: red sox turn minute maid park into their party spot not only [V: did] the astros lose four straight games to the red sox to lose the american league championship series bu they lost at home which meant the red sox had a beer and champagne celebration in the visitor clubhouse and took a team picture on the astros home field houston astros minute maid park red sox astros boston red sox
